member.name: T:Tizen.System.Resource
member.summary: Provides methods to support CPU boosting and CPU inheritance.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceSetCpuBoosting(Tizen.System.ResourcePidInfo,Tizen.System.CpuBoostingLevel,Tizen.System.CpuBoostingFlag,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set cpu boosting for the target process (pid/tids).

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceClearCpuBoosting(Tizen.System.ResourcePidInfo)
member.summary: Clear cpu boosting for the boosted process (pid/tids).

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceGetCpuBoostingLevel(Tizen.System.ResourcePidInfo,Tizen.System.CpuBoostingLevelInfo@)
member.summary: Get the cpu boosting level for the target process (pid/tids).
member.param: The boosting level for the target process (pid/tids).

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceSetCpuInheritance(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set cpu resource inheritance from the source tid to the destination process (pid/tids).

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceClearCpuInheritance(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Clear cpu resource inheritance from the source tid to the destination process (pid/tids).

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceRegisterCpuInheritanceDestination(System.String,Tizen.System.ResourcePidInfo)
member.summary: Register a destination process (pid/tids) for cpu resource inheritance.

member.name: M:Tizen.System.Resource.ResourceUnregisterCpuInheritanceDestination(System.String)
member.summary: Unregister a destination process (pid/tids) for cpu resource inheritance.

member.summary: Enumeration for the cpu boosting flag.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.CpuBoostingFlag.CpuBoostingRestOnFork
member.summary: The privilege reset on fork (or pthread_create)

member.summary: The thread id list of target.
